name: Super Portal
description:
(Made for GBJAM 8)

Ever wondered how Portal would be if it was made for the original Gameboy? No? Well I have, so you don't have to!

Looks like you found youself in a testing facility! Can you navigate your way through grueling puzzles, deadly hazards, and defeat the almighty GLaDOS?

Play through 10 levels with puzzling tests, including Cube And Button Based Testing™ and, of course, Thinking With Portals™.

And make sure to try the different color modes!

Fully colored version may be coming soon ;)
